headline: Truist Upgrades AvalonBay Communities (AVB) Stock to Buy from Hold
summary: AvalonBay Communities, Inc. (NYSE:AVB) is one of the Best Housing Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. On September 11, Truist upgraded the company’s stock to “Buy” from “Hold” with a price objective of $218, down from the prior target of $224, as reported by The Fly. As per the firm’s analyst, the shares are undervalued, as they […]

headline: Is AvalonBay Communities Stock Underperforming the Dow?
summary: AvalonBay Communities has underperformed the Dow over the past year, but analysts are cautiously optimistic about the stock’s prospects.
